code: import React from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{socketEmit}from'../../../actions/socketActions';function ItemInventory(props){var socketEmit=props.socketEmit;var gameState=props.gameSession.gameState;var handleSellItem=function handleSellItem(itemName){return function(){socketEmit({eventName:'itemAction',data:{actionType:'sell',itemName:itemName}});};};var handleEquipItem=function handleEquipItem(itemName){return function(){socketEmit({eventName:'itemAction',data:{actionType:'equip',itemName:itemName}});};};var itemList=function itemList(inventory){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,inventory.map(function(item){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,"Name: ",item.name),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,"Price: ",item.price),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,"Description: ",item.description),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{onClick:handleSellItem(item.name)},"Sell"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("button",{onClick:handleEquipItem(item.name)},"Equip"));}));};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{style:{textAlign:"right"}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,"Inventory:"),itemList(gameState.items.inventory));}function mapStateToProps(state){return{gameSession:state.gameSession};}function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{socketEmit:socketEmit(dispatch)};}export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(ItemInventory);
